onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: Congratulation on finishing your first week.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: You have unlocked 'Extra Study' and 'BCIT Store'.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: If you ever need extra experience or money, do some 'Extra Study' with your study group.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: The enemies will scale to your character so you will always be prepared for what the actual class has for you.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: If you need extra food or drinks during class, check out the 'BCIT Store'.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Help
onStartDialogue.speech: You can get anything from delicious hamburgers to ice cold milkshakes. All of them will help you in battle.
